channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google’s breakup on the table as Justice Department lays out antitrust remedies
Shein’s U.K. sales hit $2 billion ahead of possible London listing
item.description: Shein’s U.K. sales soared to £1.55 billion.

item.title: Mining giant Rio Tinto to buy Arcadium Lithium for $6.7 billion
Time to evacuate is running out as Hurricane Milton closes in on Florida
item.description: Milton was centered early Wednesday about 360 miles (580 kilometers) southwest of Tampa with maximum sustained winds of 160 mph (260 kmh).

item.title: China reportedly offered to sell EVs for a minimum of €30,000 in Europe, half the average price of EVs in the region
item.description: China's reported offer fell way below the average €66,000 price for an EV in Europe.

item.title: The price of your cheeseburger is being threatened by Big Meat, alleges McDonald’s
item.description: McDonald’s accuses all the major meat processing giants of colluding to choke the beef supply and drive up prices

item.title: Chine stocks tumble again with Beijing to discuss fiscal policy Saturday
Wednesday's analyst calls: UPS is a buy, Reddit set to jump more than 25%
item.description: A delivery giant and a social media company were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Wednesday.

item.title: Mining giant Rio Tinto to acquire Arcadium Lithium in $6.7 billion deal
item.description: The world's second-largest miner Rio Tinto said Wednesday it will acquire U.S. lithium producer Arcadium for $6.7 billion.

item.title: TSMC third quarter sales rise sharply, beat estimates

item.description: Nasir Ahmad Tawhedi entered the US on a special immigrant visa in 2021 and has been on parole status pending the conclusion of his immigration proceed...

item.title: Stock investors shouldn’t worry about Treasury yields ruining the rally — yet
HSBC exec says there's a lot of AI 'success theater' happening in finance
item.description: Some financial services firms are making bold statements about AI but not seeing tangible results, according to HSBC's head of generative AI.

item.title: China markets plunge on Beijing stimulus disappointment
item.description: Shares in mainland China plunged as traders expressed their disappointment with the lack of new stimulus. The U.S. government's possible attempt to br...

item.title: Disneyland hikes ticket prices for its highest-demand days
item.description: Disneyland's most in-demand tickets will rise around 6% in cost starting Wednesday.
